text: How to calculate a date back from another date with a given number of work days
I need to calculate date (year, month, day) which is (for example) 18 working days back from another date.
It would be enough to eliminate just weekends.
Example: I've got a date 2009-08-21 and a number of 18 workdays as a parameter, and correct answer should be 2009-07-27.
